favouriteNews.author: Kris Holt
favouriteNews.title: Facebook and Instagram’s news blackout in Canada starts today
favouriteNews.description:
As promised, Meta
 has begun blocking news content in Canada. Starting today, Facebook
 and Instagram
 users in the country will no longer be able to view or share news links or see videos and photos posted by publishers and broadcasters. The company, whic…

favouriteNews.author: Mariella Moon
favouriteNews.title: Google is reportedly testing an AI tool that can generate news articles
favouriteNews.description: Google is testing a new AI technology codenamed "Genesis" that can generate news articles, according to The New York Times. The tech giant has reportedly demonstrated the tool not just for The Times, but also for executives at The Washington Post and News Cor…
